Articles.Content: i dont know of this is the right place to ask this but is there a tool where u can add ur rocket specs and it will calculate at with heights u need to turn and when to burn and how long ?
I'm sure there's a mod like this. I've moved this to Add-on Discussions, so you can find help there.
Mechjeb or Gravity Turn. Both have modes where they tell you how to fly but don't execute automatically.
Thx i jave already but where can i find that part then ?
